Package Assignment4

Class Waiter

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Assignment4.Waiter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Waiter
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class is responsable for storing the orders in the restaurant and it also contains all the necesar methods in order to initialize new orders, which can be seen from the GUI. Also, in this class are generated the bills in form of .txt files. From here is the chef notified there food is needed.
Author:
Toth Szilveszter
See Also:
